string_apples.string: {num_apples, plural, one {This is a sentence where we're pluralizing {num_apples} apple and 1 orange.} other {This is a sentence where we're pluralizing {num_apples} apples and 1 orange.}}

string_oranges.string: {num_oranges, plural, one {This is a sentence where we're pluralizing 1 apple and {num_oranges} orange.} other {This is a sentence where we're pluralizing 1 apple and {num_oranges} oranges.}}
